remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 事件发生时，将调用事件处理程序，直到删除委托。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate. 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用已定义多个 部分的 类在窗体上显示标签。The following example demonstrates using the class, with multiple sections defined, to display a label on a form. 该示例演示如何设置 ""、""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，以自定义 的外观。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , and properties to customize the look of the . 第一个 使用 属性指定。The first is specified using the property. 使用 方法将其他链接添加到 。Additional links are added to the using the method. 该示例通过启动用于超链接的 Web 浏览器并显示其他链接的 来处理 事件。The example handles the event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a for other links.
